short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore daily fresh articles from around the web and follow what matter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Siftap is a reinvented RSS and Social media reader. It's a suite which let you follow favourite sites, blogs, social media and create own content. Mix articles, videos, music, social media posts each other and publish onto customised website feeds with an email digest. Add logo, edit layout, colours and choose the font for your feed. Publish a self curated digest on your custom domain.

It's simple as a social network. Increase your audience and get more subscribers. Or just stay up to date and be inspired.
